description:
From their law office in Lakeland, Florida, the dedicated legal professionals at The Turnbull Firm provide exceptional advocacy and support to clients throughout the state who have suffered a serious injury or lost a loved one due to someone else's negligence or wrongdoing. With additional law offices in Orlando and Winter Haven, they have grown to become one of their region's most prominent injury practices.

The Turnbull Firm has achieved remarkable success fighting on behalf of individuals and families adversely affected by any of the following:

  • Car, truck and other motor vehicle accidents
  • Medical malpractice and nursing home abuse
  • Slip-and-fall accidents
  • Construction accidents
  • Warehouse, plant and industrial accidents
  • Drunk and distracted driving accidents
  • Other preventable tragedies

A top-ranked trial advocate with more than 11 years of total legal experience, attorney Sanga Turnbull established his law firm with a mission to deliver the highest level of representation possible to those in need. A former insurance defense attorney, he has invaluable insight into the industry, and he has recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for his plaintiff clients, including many six- and seven-figure awards.

Regardless of the cause of your suffering, you can rely on Mr. Turnbull to sit with you and discuss your options to help you make the best informed decisions. He promises to fight aggressively both inside and outside the courtroom to help increase your chances of obtaining the maximum amount of compensation you need and the justice you deserve.

To find out more, you can contact The Turnbull Firm by calling their law office or visiting their website to schedule a free case evaluation. They also offer virtual consultations in these trying times to help keep you and your family members safe and healthy.
